channel.title: Eclipse [667] || Completionist || Dominion Tower || Summoning || Nex
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Welcome to Eclipse 667 Loading [b]704[/b]!![/size]
[IMG]http://eclipse667.com/logo.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Server Status :ALPHA[/size]
[B][U][SIZE=16pt][COLOR=Blue]Server Status Key:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] [COLOR=Red]ALPHA[/COLOR] - Closed Alpha || Staff Only [COLOR=Yellow]BETA[/COLOR] - Public Beta (Expected Release Date 2/1/2012) [COLOR=Lime]ONLINE [/COLOR]- Economy Server Begins and we move out of the BETA stage.
=======================================================================================================================
[B][U][COLOR=Red]Features:[/COLOR][/U][/B] Eclipse server: - Eclipse 667 is a economy based server, we also have a unquie point system called Eclipse points that can be used to obtain the best items in game(Chaotics, PvP Armour and weapons, And much more). But do not worry because this server is packed full of content and bosses and skilling and much much more!
PvP/Pking: - Eclipse 667 has a Perfect PvP system. - We also have a lot of pkers who are into Hybridding, a well-known and fun type of pking - Switching is near perfect (99% RS Speeds) - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP
PvM: - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Close to 100% Godwars (Missing Armadyl and Zamorak will have up soon) - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows & More...
PvP And PvM: - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers)
Miscellaneous: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - Flawless Music & Sound system - Perfect XP counter
=======================================================================================================================
Eclipse 667 Dedi Speedtest [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1665894778.png[/img]
=======================================================================================================================
Server Media [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/4uTT9C.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/3s5DmR.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/nQKXOd.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/q7p0nJ.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/rYf4Qh.png[/img]
Will add more soon. [/center]

item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“makkesk8, post:10, topic:431164”]Looks really good

also a question that goes out to every1… why is there no COMPLETE rsps? what i mean with that is that it has everything that regular runescape has… ive never seen a rsps like that… and it would be unique and more entertaining to have an exact copy but just easier… and also most of the rsps’s out there today dosnt have a functional grand exchange which really relieves the buy/sell procedure.

Sure rsps’s are all about classic rs, or is it?

Just personal thoughts :E

Also, are you adding corp? :D[/quote]
Not sure if you’re trolling or just an idiot.

Read full topic

Just personal thoughts :E
